reviews.review_msg: I'm taking Addisu Bailie at UFV, but the listing for him at UFV is not yet created. I know AIS299 is a useless class, but Addisu's class is worse than useless. His online class feels like he did the bare minimum, using videos from 12 years ago for Indigenization units. He also has assignments that are less helpful than high school planning classes.

Addisu was unreasonable with his students in this online course. He scheduled short quizzes on weekends (sat-sun), 5qs long, worth 1% of our overall mark for each q. Despite being asked to adjust the schedule, it took a heavy push for him to do so. Group assignments were unfairly weighted & groups were assigned by himself. Grading scale was tough.
Addisu is very kind, however, the lectures were extremely dry. He's a pretty easy marker, but just make sure you participate as much as you can.
I had Addisu as a TA for educ252 and he always gave good feedback and overall, wanted us to succeed!
